name: BlindWrite 4 Track Information FIle
summary: A BWT file is a track information file created by BlindWrite 4.x, a Windows program used to copy games and backup discs. It contains information that describes the structure of a disc image saved in a .BWI file. BWT files include information such as the artist and length of audio tracks on a CD or length of features on a DVD.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
